specs.name:
Front suspension: MacPherson Strut with coil springs and gas
						shock absorbers

Rear suspension: Torsion axle with coil springs and monotube
						shock absorbers
14-inch steel wheels with wheelcovers and P175/70R14 tires
Cargo volume (cu. ft.) rear seats up
Cargo volume (cu. ft.) rear seats down

4-wheel, 4-channel Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) with
						Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD) and Brake Assist (BA)
Driver and front passenger advanced airbags (SRS) (2)

Driver and front passenger seat-mounted side-impact airbags
						(SRS) (2)
LATCH (Lower Anchors and Tethers for CHildren)
Remote keyless entry system with alarm
Bodycolor dual power, manual-folding side mirrors
Tinted glass with windshield shade band
Adjustable head restraints for all seating positions
Sliding center armrest with storage compartment
Leather-wrapped steering wheel and shift knob
